about_the_game: Original soundtrack for Your Computer Might Be At Risk by Tenebris Studio, composed by Sergio Escanciano. Contains 30 tracks with all the music of the game, mixed to be played as independent themes.
detailed_description: Original soundtrack for Your Computer Might Be At Risk by Tenebris Studio, composed by Sergio Escanciano. Contains 30 tracks with all the music of the game, mixed to be played as independent themes.
